pr_title: UFO Secondary Indexes remove comparator for indexes on Protobufs

timeline.message: UFO Secondary Indexes remove comparator for indexes on Protobufs

timeline.bodyText:
this protobuf isn't used in the current CorfuShimStoreTest.java
Could you please help change the ExampleValue inside example_schema.proto in the runtime directory instead? That way we will instantly know if it works.
